explains: vt. 使个性化；把……拟人化

sentences.en: The mass media tends to personalize politics.
sentences.cn: 大众传媒往往把政治个人化。

sentences.en: You can usually also personalize a computer dictionary.
sentences.cn: 你还通常可以根据个人需要设计一个电脑词典。

sentences.en: When you sign up, you adopt an animated penguin to chat with friends, play games, explore, collect coins and even personalize your very own igloo.
sentences.cn: 注册时，你就会领养一只活泼的企鹅来与朋友聊天、玩游戏、探索、收集硬币、甚至让你自己的圆顶冰屋个性化。
